11645.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms

11709.quoteText: 2.4 These Terms of Service may be subject to change without prior notice and will be valid upon publication unless specifically indicated otherwise by the RIPE NCC. By continuing to Use the Website or any of the Publicly Available RIPE NCC Services after any changes are made to these Terms of Service, Users confirm that they have read, understood and agree to be bound to these changes.
11709.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

11710.quoteText:
2.3. Sharing your personal data with third parties

The RIPE NCC may engage third parties for the provision of RIPE NCC services. In such cases, personal data collected for that particular purpose may be shared with these parties.
11710.title: Your personal data is given to third parties

tosdr.case: Your personal data is given to third parties

11711.quoteText:
5. Accessing and changing your information

You have the right to ask that inaccurate or incomplete data relating to you is rectified.
11711.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

tosdr.case: You can request access and deletion of personal data

11712.quoteText:
If you have questions or concerns about the accuracy or appropriateness of any other personal information held by the RIPE NCC, please contact ncc@ripe.net.
RIPE NCC will respond and seek to correct any problems as soon as possible.
11712.title: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data

tosdr.case: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data
